domain.en: God of war and wealth, symbol of loyalty and righteousness

description.zh-TW: 關聖帝君是三國時代的名將，象徵忠義與財富。
description.en: Guansheng Dijun is a famous general from the Three Kingdoms, symbolizing loyalty and wealth.

story.zh-TW: 傳說他忠義無雙，受人敬仰。
story.en: Legend says he is the symbol of loyalty and is highly respected.

description.zh-TW: 媽祖是漁民與航海者的守護神。
description.en: Mazu is the protector of fishermen and sailors.

story.zh-TW: 相傳媽祖能夠保佑出海平安。
story.en: It is said that Mazu blesses those who go to sea.

domain.zh-TW: 地方守護神，管理陰陽兩界
domain.en: City god, guardian of local communities and the underworld

description.zh-TW: 地方守護神，管理陰陽兩界。
description.en: City god, guardian of local communities and the underworld.

story.zh-TW: 城隍爺負責守護城池，管理陰陽。
story.en: Chenghuang is responsible for guarding the city and managing the underworld.

domain.en: God of land and agriculture, protector of local fields

description.en: God of land and agriculture, protector of local fields.

story.zh-TW: 土地公保佑地方平安、農作豐收。
story.en: Tudigong blesses local peace and good harvests.

domain.en: Supreme Emperor of the Dark Heaven, powerful northern deity who wards off evil

description.en: Supreme Emperor of the Dark Heaven, powerful northern deity who wards off evil.

story.zh-TW: 玄天上帝能驅邪避災，保佑信眾。
story.en: Xuantian Shangdi wards off evil and protects believers.
